mapper.select: SELECT rd.coinid, rd.amount, rd.evaluate guestappraisal, sacbi.evaluate, rd.score, rd.remark, rd.numindex, rd.totalreqcost, rd.totalevaluate, rd.amountofissue, rd.guestappraisal, rd.wmk, rd.whetherSample, rd.blockNum, rd.guestWRSize as size, rd.guestWRWeight as zhongliang, sacbi.fullsubject, sacbi.shortsubject, sacbi.facevaluedis, sacbi.zhino, sacbi.color, sacbi.issuedate, sacbi.issuetime, sacbi.issuingquantity, rd.stampjointype, (SELECT money FROM sys_box_basic_info box WHERE boxid=box.id) as boxCost, ExtractValue(st.fullname, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']") guojia, rd.version FROM request_detail rd, sys_stamp_basic_info sacbi, sys_country st WHERE rd.coinid = sacbi.id AND sacbi.country = st.id AND rd.requestid = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY rd.numindex
SELECT * FROM sys_stamp_basic_info sacbi left join sys_country sc on sc.id=sacbi.country WHERE sacbi.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT sacbi.id, catalogue, zhino, color, issuedate, sacbi.issuingquantity, issuetime, country, ExtractValue ( c.fullname, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']" ) guojia, fullsubject, shortsubject, commonlysubject, facevaluedis, (SELECT money FROM sys_box_basic_info box WHERE boxid=box.id) as boxCost, size, version, evaluate, remarks, CONCAT_WS( c.shortname, fullsubject, shortsubject, commonlysubject, shortsubject, facevaluedis, VERSION ) FROM sys_stamp_basic_info sacbi, sys_country c WHERE c.id = sacbi.country
and sacbi.country =#{country}
and sacbi.facevaluedis like CONCAT("%",#{facevaluedis},"%")
and sacbi.zhino like CONCAT("%",#{zhino},"%")
and sacbi.color like CONCAT("%",#{color},"%")
and sacbi.issuedate like CONCAT("%",#{issuedate},"%")
and CONCAT_WS( c.shortname, fullsubject, shortsubject, commonlysubject, shortsubject, facevaluedis, issuedate, version ) like CONCAT("%",#{item},"%")
limit #{startRow},15

SELECT r.requestcode, rc.coincode, rc.tagindex, rc.remark, rc.ratingreasondis, co.shortname as coincountry, rd.evaluate, rd.numindex, r.usercode, r.customer, r.mobile, r.mail, r.serviceid, r.speed, r.totalamount, r.totalweight, r.totalpreferential, r.othercost, r.totalevaluate, r.totalreqcost, r.totalpremium, r.totaltransportation, r.totalinsurance, r.totalcost, r.sendtype, r.payment, rc.score, r.entitytype, ExtractValue ( co.fullname, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']" ) AS country, ExtractValue ( p. NAME, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']" ) AS province, ExtractValue ( c.fullname, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']" ) AS city, ExtractValue ( d.fullname, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']" ) AS area, r.address, r.paystatus, rc.coinevaluate guestappraisal, rd.totalreqcost AS totalcoincost, rd.coinid, num.gpn AS sameCoinNum FROM ( SELECT rc1.coincode, rc1.coinid AS cid, count(*) AS gpn FROM request_coin rc1, request_detail rd1, request_main r1 WHERE r1.requestcode = #{requestcode,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND rc1.requestid = rd1.requestid AND rc1.coinid = rd1.coinid AND rc1.requestid = r1.id GROUP BY rc1.coinid ) num, request_coin rc LEFT JOIN request_detail rd ON rc.requestid = rd.requestid AND rc.coinid = rd.coinid LEFT JOIN request_main r ON rc.requestid = r.id LEFT JOIN sys_country co ON r.country = co.id LEFT JOIN sys_province p ON r.province = p.id LEFT JOIN sys_city c ON r.city = c.id LEFT JOIN sys_district d ON r.area = d.id LEFT JOIN sys_stamp_basic_info sacbi ON rc.coinid = sacbi.id WHERE r.requestcode = #{requestcode,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND num.cid = rd.coinid ORDER BY coincode ASC

SELECT rc.id, rc.coincode,sc.shortname as guojia,sacbi.fullsubject,sacbi.facevaluedis, rd.guestWRWeight as zhongliang,rd.guestWRSize as size,rd.version,rc.remark as coinremark,rd.guestWRGrade as grade, rd.requestid,rcs.level,rc.score,rc.ratingreasondis,rc.coinnum from request_coin rc left join request_coin_score rcs on rcs.requestcoinid=rc.id, request_detail rd, sys_stamp_basic_info sacbi , sys_country sc,request_main r where rd.id=rc.requestdetailid AND sacbi.country=sc.id AND rd.coinid=sacbi.id AND r.id=rd.requestid AND rc.id=#{requestcoinid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by rc.coincode

SELECT rc.id, rc.coincode,rd.requestid,ifnull(rc.coinspecialtype,sacbi.specialtype) as coinspecialtype,sacbi.wmk,sacbi.zhino,sc.shortname as guojia,ifnull(rc.customsize,sacbi.size) as size, sacbi.issuetime,sacbi.issuedate,ifnull(rc.coinfullsubject,ifnull(sacbi.shortsubject,sacbi.fullsubject)) as coinfullsubject,ifnull(rc.coincover,sacbi.cover)as coincover,sacbi.facevaluedis, ifnull(rc.coincovernewold,sacbi.covernewold) as coincovernewold,sacbi.color,ifnull(rc.coinpostmark,sacbi.postmark) as coinpostmark, ifnull(rc.coinstampjointype,rd.stampjointype)as coinstampjointype,sacbi.version, ifnull(rc.coinhole,sacbi.hole)as coinhole,ifnull(rc.coinplatemode,sacbi.platemode)as coinplatemode,ifnull(rc.coinseriesnum,sacbi.seriesnum)as coinseriesnum, ifnull(rc.coinmotto,sacbi.motto)as coinmotto,sacbi.gum,ifnull(rc.coinissuingquantity,sacbi.issuingquantity)as coinissuingquantity, ifnull(rc.coinsummary,sacbi.summary)as coinsummary,rc.remark,rc.ratingreasondis,rc.remark,rc.coinnum, ifnull(rc.coinprintingpaper,sacbi.printingpaper)as coinprintingpaper,rc.coinfeatures, (CASE WHEN r.serviceid = 1 THEN '新评' WHEN r.serviceid = 2 THEN '重评' WHEN r.serviceid = 5 THEN '真品鉴定' END ) serviceid from request_coin rc left join request_coin_score rcs on rcs.requestcoinid=rc.id, request_detail rd, sys_stamp_basic_info sacbi, sys_country sc,request_main r where rd.id=rc.requestdetailid AND sacbi.country=sc.id AND rd.coinid=sacbi.id AND r.id=rd.requestid AND rc.coincode=#{coincode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY rc.coincode

SELECT c.zhino, c.catalogue, IFNULL(IFNULL(rc.coinfullsubject,c.shortsubject),c.fullsubject) as shortsubject, c.version, c.facevaluedis, rc.customsize size, rc.coinfeatures, ( CASE c.country WHEN c.country = '1' THEN ExtractValue ( t.fullname, "//value[@lang='zh_CN']" ) ELSE ExtractValue ( t.fullname, "//value[@lang='en_US']" ) END ) AS country, rc.score, rc.coincode, rc.difversion, rc.ratingreasondis FROM sys_stamp_basic_info c, sys_country t, request_coin rc, request_detail rd WHERE rc.coincode LIKE CONCAT(#{requestCode}, '%') AND rc.coinid = c.id AND rc.requestdetailid = rd.id AND t.id = c.country ORDER BY coincode

SELECT rc.id, rc.coinid, rc.coincode, ifnull(rc.coinstampjointype,rd.stampjointype) as coinstampjointype, ifnull(rc.coinfullsubject,sacbi.fullsubject) as coinfullsubject, ifnull(rc.coincovernewold,sacbi.covernewold) as coincovernewold, sacbi.facevaluedis, sacbi.evaluate, rc.customSize AS size, rc.difversion, rc.score, rc.remark AS pubremark, rc.ratingreasondis, rc.coinremark, rc.coinmotto, rc.coinnum, rc.coinboxid, rc.coinevaluate, rc.reqcost, sacbi.zhino, sacbi.color, sacbi.issuedate, sacbi.issuetime, rd.amount FROM request_detail rd, request_coin rc, request_main r, sys_stamp_basic_info sacbi WHERE ( r.id = #{requestid} OR r.requestcode = #{requestid} ) AND rc.requestdetailid = rd.id AND r.id = rd.requestid AND sacbi.id = rd.coinid ORDER BY rc.coincode

SELECT rc.id,rc.coincode,sacbi.zhino,sacbi.issuetime,ifnull(rc.coinfullsubject,sacbi.fullsubject)as coinfullsubject, sacbi.facevaluedis,sacbi.color,ifnull(rc.coinstampjointype,rd.stampjointype) as coinstampjointype, ifnull(rc.coincovernewold,sacbi.covernewold) as coincovernewold,rd.amount,rc.ratingreasondis,rc.coinremark, ifnull(rc.customSize,sacbi.size)as size,rc.difversion,rc.coinnum, rcs.score,rcs.scoreby,rcs.`level`,rcs.remark,rc.remark as pubremark,rcs.ratingreasondis from request_coin rc LEFT JOIN request_coin_score rcs on rcs.requestcoinid=rc.id, sys_stamp_basic_info sacbi , request_detail rd where rd.id=rc.requestdetailid AND rd.coinid=sacbi.id AND rc.requestid=#{requestid} ORDER BY rc.coincode,rcs.level,rcs.scoreby

SELECT rc.id,rc.coincode,sacbi.zhino,sacbi.issuetime,ifnull(rc.coinfullsubject,sacbi.fullsubject)as coinfullsubject,sacbi.facevaluedis,sacbi.color, ifnull(rc.coinstampjointype,rd.stampjointype) as coinstampjointype,ifnull(rc.coincovernewold,sacbi.covernewold) as coincovernewold, rc.ratingreasondis,rc.coinremark,rc.coinnum, rc.customSize as size,rc.difversion, rcs.score,rcs.scoreby,rcs.`level`,rcs.remark,rc.remark as pubremark,rcs.ratingreasondis FROM request_coin rc LEFT JOIN request_coin_score rcs ON rcs.requestcoinid=rc.id AND rcs.scoreby=#{scoreby} AND rcs.`level`='1' LEFT JOIN request_detail rd ON rd.id=rc.requestdetailid LEFT JOIN request_main r ON r.id=rc.requestid LEFT JOIN sys_stamp_basic_info sacbi ON sacbi.id=rc.coinid LEFT JOIN sys_country sc ON sc.id=sacbi.country WHERE rc.requestid=#{requestid} ORDER BY rc.coincode
